name: How to Destroy Angels
description: '''How to Destroy Angels''' is an American [[Post-industrial music|post-industrial]] band formed in 2009 by [[Nine Inch Nails]] members [[Trent Reznor]] and [[Atticus Ross]] alongside former [[West Indian Girl]] member (and Reznor's wife) [[Mariqueen Maandig]] and longtime Nine Inch Nails collaborator [[Rob Sheridan]]. The group is named for the [[How to Destroy Angels (Coil EP)|1984 Coil EP]]. [[Alessandro Cortini]] joined the lineup for the duration of the 2013 tour.
